sys_ux_client_script.name: AIAB Chat Injector Init

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_1f74146283e6b2104d4fccb6feaad32d
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="AIAB Chat Injector">0664dc2283e6b2104d4fccb6feaad3e3</macroponent><name>AIAB Chat Injector Init</name><preset/><required_translations>[]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * AIAB Chat Injector - Injects chat widget iframe in Workspace
 * Watches for URL changes since Workspace is a SPA
 */
(function() {
  console.log('AIAB Chat Injector: Starting...');
  
  // Avoid duplicate injection
  if (window.__aiabChatInjected) {
    console.log('AIAB Chat Injector: Already injected, skipping');
    return {};
  }
  window.__aiabChatInjected = true;
  
  var lastUrl = '';
  var iframe = null;
  
  // Size constants
  var BUTTON_WIDTH = '140px';
  var BUTTON_HEIGHT = '70px';
  var NORMAL_WIDTH = '420px';
  var NORMAL_HEIGHT = '550px';
  var WIDE_WIDTH = '620px';
  var WIDE_HEIGHT = '620px';
  
  // Parse Workspace URL patterns
  function parseWorkspaceUrl(url) {
    var patterns = [
      /\/now\/sow\/record\/([^\/]+)\/([a-f0-9]{32})/i,
      /\/now\/workspace\/[^\/]+\/record\/([^\/]+)\/([a-f0-9]{32})/i,
      /\/now\/[^\/]+\/record\/([^\/]+)\/([a-f0-9]{32})/i
    ];
    
    for (var i = 0; i < patterns.length; i++) {
      var match = url.match(patterns[i]);
      if (match) {
        return { table: match[1], sysId: match[2] };
      }
    }
    return null;
  }
  
  // Create or update the iframe
  function updateChatIframe(table, sysId) {
    var iframeSrc = '/$sp.do?id=aiab_chat';
    if (table && sysId) {
      iframeSrc += '&record_table=' + encodeURIComponent(table);
      iframeSrc += '&record_sys_id=' + encodeURIComponent(sysId);
    }
    
    if (!iframe) {
      iframe = document.createElement('iframe');
      iframe.id = 'aiab-chat-iframe';
      iframe.style.cssText = 'position:fixed;bottom:10px;right:10px;width:' + BUTTON_WIDTH + ';height:' + BUTTON_HEIGHT + ';border:none;z-index:10000;background:transparent;';
      iframe.setAttribute('allowtransparency', 'true');
      document.body.appendChild(iframe);
      console.log('AIAB Chat Injector: Iframe created');
      
      window.addEventListener('message', function(event) {
        if (!event.data || !event.data.type) return;
        var chatIframe = document.getElementById('aiab-chat-iframe');
        if (!chatIframe) return;
        
        if (event.data.type === 'aiab-resize') {
          chatIframe.style.width = event.data.wide ? WIDE_WIDTH : NORMAL_WIDTH;
          chatIframe.style.height = event.data.wide ? WIDE_HEIGHT : NORMAL_HEIGHT;
        }
        
        if (event.data.type === 'aiab-toggle') {
          if (event.data.open) {
            chatIframe.style.width = event.data.wide ? WIDE_WIDTH : NORMAL_WIDTH;
            chatIframe.style.height = event.data.wide ? WIDE_HEIGHT : NORMAL_HEIGHT;
            chatIframe.style.bottom = '0';
            chatIframe.style.right = '0';
          } else {
            chatIframe.style.width = BUTTON_WIDTH;
            chatIframe.style.height = BUTTON_HEIGHT;
            chatIframe.style.bottom = '10px';
            chatIframe.style.right = '10px';
          }
        }
      });
    }
    
    var newSrc = window.location.origin + iframeSrc;
    if (iframe.src !== newSrc) {
      console.log('AIAB Chat Injector: Updating iframe to', iframeSrc);
      iframe.src = iframeSrc;
      iframe.style.width = BUTTON_WIDTH;
      iframe.style.height = BUTTON_HEIGHT;
      iframe.style.bottom = '10px';
      iframe.style.right = '10px';
    }
  }
  
  function hideChatIframe() {
    if (iframe) iframe.style.display = 'none';
  }
  
  function showChatIframe() {
    if (iframe) iframe.style.display = 'block';
  }
  
  function checkForUrlChange() {
    var currentUrl = window.location.href;
    if (currentUrl === lastUrl) return;
    lastUrl = currentUrl;
    
    var record = parseWorkspaceUrl(currentUrl);
    if (record) {
      console.log('AIAB Chat Injector: Record detected', record.table, record.sysId);
      showChatIframe();
      updateChatIframe(record.table, record.sysId);
    } else {
      hideChatIframe();
    }
  }
  
  setInterval(checkForUrlChange, 500);
  window.addEventListener('popstate', checkForUrlChange);
  checkForUrlChange();
  
  console.log('AIAB Chat Injector: URL watcher started');
  return {};
})();]]></script><script_api_version>1</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>opencode</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2026-01-22 19:32:26</sys_created_on><sys_id>1f74146283e6b2104d4fccb6feaad32d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AIAB Chat Injector Init</sys_name><sys_package display_value="AI in a Box" source="0439d1f593948210071230a97bba1016">0439d1f593948210071230a97bba1016</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="AI in a Box">0439d1f593948210071230a97bba1016</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_1f74146283e6b2104d4fccb6feaad32d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>opencode</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2026-01-22 19:32:26</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
